item.title: Do NBA teams with greater team salaries win more?
item.description:
FiveThirtyEight is one of my favourite places to read thoughtful analysis, and see data visualizations. I was inspired by one of their posts on 'how your favourite baseball team blows its money'. As an avid basketball fan, I recreated this graphic with NBA data.

This was incredible practice with Matplotlib …
item.dc:creator: Garry Chan

item.title: Lambda function for data wrangling
item.description:
Coming from a math background, to me, Lambda's represented the parameter in exponential distributions, eigenvalues in linear algebra, or in the context of AWS Lambda, a compute service for managing servers!

Whereas in programming, by definition, Lambda is an anonymous function. This means that unlike normal functions definitions, Lambdas do …
item.dc:creator: Garry Chan
